title: Latisha noticed in early evening difficulty seeing

content.question: Latisha noticed that in the early evening she begins to have difficulty seeing the vibrant colors in her artwork. Which of the following best explains her difficulty?

choices.label: Her rods are functioning improperly and are not sensing color.
Her cones cannot detect color well in dim light.
Light adaptation prevents sensation of color.
Her blindspot is not correctly transferring color neural impulses.

content.answer: Her cones cannot detect color well in dim light.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
